data.title: Wonderful
data.text: The Fudgery not only has amazing fudge, it also has dipped apples, ice cream and shakes.  If you are lucky you'll get to hear a song while you're there.

data.title: Sweet tooth!
data.text: This place has it all.  Smoothies, ice cream, fudge, turtles, pretzels, toffee, rice crispy treats, coated apples, nuts and drinks.  Felt sorry for the young lady working because she was the only one there and there were 10 customers.  Fairly expensive.  We got 2 turtles and a piece of toffee for $19.  Definitely tastes good.

data.title: Super Fudge
data.text: Stopped in looking for something sweet after dinner. They had a number of different varieties of fudge available. After tasting a few we settled on 1. Only 1 simply because they are about 1/2 lb or more each. That's a lot of fudge. We watched them making 2 different types right behind the counter while we were deciding which one to get. Interesting! The 3 staff were very friendly and spent some time with us describing the different varieties and how they made them. The facility itself could have been a little cleaner but that probably was the result of a number of people who came thru just before us. It was as good fudge as I have had. Plus we know it was freshly nade.
